short_summary: Purchase of 10 items for CT114 Tutor aircraft for Department of National Defence
description: The DND is looking to purchase 10 aviation replacement parts for the CT114 Tutor aircraft through Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series. The procurement will be competitive and the tender will be open to qualified supply arrangement holders. The proposal will be e-mailed directly to the qualified suppliers. Contact information for the contracting officer can be found below.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Title:** Pack And Harness Assy (Ensemble de pack et de harnais)
**Reference Number:** W8485-247842/A, Amendment 3
**Publication Date:** 2023-10-16
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-27T14:00:00 (Closed)

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

The Department of National Defence (DND), Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) 5, intends to acquire 10 items for the CT114 Tutor.

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is exclusive to Qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series, which includes:

1. JHT Defense Inc.
2.  Aero Precision Industries LLC
3. Aero Technical Components Inc.
4. Patlon Aircraft & Industries Limited
5. Simex Defence Inc.
6. Tower Aerospace Inc.
7. Unisource Technology Inc.
8. Canada West Avionics
9. Rockwell Collins Canada
10. TSL Aerospace Technologies.

**Proposal Submission**

RFP documents will be e-mailed directly to the qualified SA Holders. The Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the RFP documents.

Inquiries regarding this RFP requirement should be submitted to the Contracting Authority listed below:

* Ryan Duncan, Aerospace Equipment Program Management, Department of National Defence, (613) 292-9650, Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca.

**Ongoing Opportunity for Qualification**

A notice will be posted annually on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series.

**Countries Affected**

This tender announcement affects Canada.

**Categories Affected**

* Aviation (Aéronefs)
* General Defense (Défense générale)

**Contact Information**

* Ryan Duncan, Contracting Officer, Department of National Defence, (613) 292-9650, Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca.

**Submission Methods**

Submission of proposal should be sent via email to Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca.

**Document Links**

The RFP document can be found on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website.

**References**

This tender announcement is based on the following references: [insert references].
